traits.name: Terrorizing Transmogrification
traits.desc: The disciple contains three distinct mutations that affect its combat abilities, its movements, and its defenses. Choose randomly from the lists below or choose them yourself to craft specific monstrosities.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The zealot makes one attack with its longsword and one with its off-hand attack.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage.
